Value: Deterra Royalties Limited operates as a royalty investment company in Australia. The company's principal asset is the Mining Area C Royalty, an iron ore located in the Pilbara, Western Australia. It is also involved in the management and acquisition of a portfolio of royalties across bulk commodities, base metals, and battery metals. In addition, the company holds interests in a portfolio of five small royalties. Deterra Royalties Limited was incorporated in 2020 and is headquartered in Perth, Australia.
